mapper.select: SELECT tr.ROOM_IDX, ROOM_NAME, BED_NAME, BED_CNT, tr.HOTEL_CODE FROM td_room tr, td_room_bed trb where tr.room_idx = trb.room_idx and tr.hotel_code = trb.hotel_code and tr.room_idx = #{room_idx}
SELECT RIMAGE_PATH FROM td_room_image WHERE ROOM_IDX=#{room_idx}
SELECT rf_name FROM TD_ROOM_INFO tri, TD_ROOM_FACILITY trf WHERE tri.RF_IDX= trf.RF_IDX AND tri.ROOM_IDX =#{room_idx}
